entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Flurries or rain showers in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
